scripts.deploy: if [ -z ${PWS_ORG+x} ]; then echo "please set PWS_ORG, PWS_SPACE, PWS_USERNAME, and PWS_PASSWORD"; else cf login -a api.run.pivotal.io -o ${PWS_ORG} -s ${PWS_SPACE} -u ${PWS_USERNAME} -p ${PWS_PASSWORD}; fi && webpack -p && cf push houndstooth -b https://github.com/cloudfoundry/staticfile-buildpack.git -m 64m
scripts.setup: npm i && git config user.name "Douglas Blumeyer" && git config user.email douglas.blumeyer@gmail.com && git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule foreach git checkout master && git submodule foreach git config user.name "Douglas Blumeyer" && git submodule foreach git config user.email douglas.blumeyer@gmail.com
scripts.push-all: git submodule foreach git push && git push
scripts.pull-all: git pull -r && git submodule foreach git pull -r
scripts.test: npm run coverage && npm run integration
scripts.ci: npm run unit && npm run integration
